text: Welcome to the rooftop of our apartment in Chiang Mai, Thailand. We've been in Thailand for two weeks now and the reason why we're making
this super random video on this rooftop is because we have two positions
open at Yes Theory and we want them to be filled by people in our community, meaning two of you guys.
We believe that the only and most effective way for us to keep spreading the Yes Theory message to more people around the world is
by tapping into the talent of this community, and that's what this video is about today. First position
we're hiring a graphic designer.
We need somebody to help us make new designs for the Seek Discomfort clothing line
every single month and help us with design on various other Yes Theory
Projects you might have. So the way to apply for this position will be by
redesigning the Yes Theory logo and all the details for how to apply and about this application will be in the description. Second position.
We're hiring a badass storyteller and editor to come join us in LA. For the past six months
we've tried to fill this position but no one has so far successfully been able to add their own taste and creativity
into our editing. So we need someone that can not only edit a Yes Theory episode, but enhance it. Make it ten,
twenty, thirty percent better than what it already is.
Ideally, you're probably American or can work in the US, but if you're not and you think you're up to the task
definitely feel free to apply. There's always a way for us to figure out visas. All the further details and selection criteria
will be in the description of this video as well.
So if you or anyone that, you know is up for this challenge, make sure you send them this video.
You've got two weeks to apply starting right now.
We will see you tomorrow.
